/* 조회 */ SELECT apa.accounting_purchase_admin_idx as accountingPurchaseAdminIdx , apa.company_idx as companyIdx , apa.inventory_idx as inventoryIdx , apa.company_contract_idx as companyContractIdx , apa.accounting_purchase_admin_date as accountingPurchaseAdminDate , apa.accounting_purchase_admin_price as accountingPurchaseAdminPrice , apa.accounting_purchase_admin_amount as accountingPurchaseAdminAmount , apa.accounting_purchase_admin_payment as accountingPurchaseAdminPayment , apa.accounting_purchase_admin_sum as accountingPurchaseAdminSum , apa.admin_username as adminUsername , apa.accounting_purchase_admin_update as accountingPurchaseAdminUpdate
FROM accounting_purchase_admin apa INNER JOIN company c ON apa.company_idx = c.company_idx INNER JOIN inventory i ON apa.inventory_idx = i.inventory_idx INNER JOIN company_contract cc ON apa.company_contract_idx = cc.company_contract_idx INNER JOIN admin a ON apa.admin_username = a.admin_username
SELECT company_idx as companyIdx , company_type as companyType , admin_username as companyUsername FROM company
SELECT inventory_idx as inventoryIdx , inventory_type as inventoryType FROM inventory

SELECT company_contract_idx as companyContractIdx , company_contract_delivery_term as companyContractDeliveryTerm , company_contract_start as companyContractStart , company_contract_end as companyContractEnd , company_contract_amount as companyContractAmount FROM company_contract
SELECT admin_username as adminUsername , admin_name as adminName FROM admin

/* 삭제 대상 회원 조회*/ SELECT accounting_purchase_admin_idx , company_idx, inventory_idx , company_contract_idx , accounting_purchase_admin_date , accounting_purchase_admin_price , accounting_purchase_admin_amount , accounting_purchase_admin_payment , accounting_purchase_admin_sum , admin_username , accounting_purchase_admin_update FROM accounting_purchase_admin = #{accountingPurchaseAdminIdx}
